com.apperian.javautil

Class Methods

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apperian.javautil.Methods

  • final class Methods
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for retrieving information about a Method object.
    Author:
    James Seibel, Kevin LaFlamme

    • Method Detail

      • invokeMethod

        static java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                            java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                            java.lang.Object[] args)
                              throws UnsupportedTypeException
        Calls method on obj

        This will invoke method using obj as this, passing args as the arguments. obj should be a {Class if method is static

        Parameters:
        obj - The object to invoke the method on
        method - The Method object to invoke
        args - An array of arguments to pass to the method
        Returns:
        Returns the return value of the invoked method
        Throws:
        UnsupportedTypeException

      • getSignature

        static java.lang.String getSignature(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Gets the method signature for a particular Method

        This method returns the internal method signature for a Method object. This signature can be used to retrieve the jmethodID via JNI

        Parameters:
        method - The Method object used to retrieve the signature
        Returns:
        A String representing the method signature

      • getArgTypes

        static int[] getArgTypes(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Gets an internal representation of the argument types used by the native interface
        Parameters:
        method - The Method object used to retrieve the argument types
        Returns:
        The internal representation of the argument types
